comments: Note that this is different from the count of 3-Carmichael numbers, A132195. The numbers counted here are neither those listed in A087788 (3 arbitrary prime factors) nor those listed in A033502 (where 6m+1, 12m+1 and 18m+1 are all prime). - _M. F. Hasler_, Apr 14 2015
references: Posting by Harvey Dubner (harvey(AT)dubner.com) to Number Theory List (NMBRTHRY(AT)LISTSERV.NODAK.EDU), Nov 23 1998.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Carmichael numbers.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
